title: My name is Minh, which means brightness and intelligence.
description: maɪ neɪm ɪz mɪn, wɪʧ minz ˈbraɪtnəs ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤəns.

title: My parents chose it because they wished for me to have a bright and prosperous future.
segments: have a bright and prosperous future
highlight: have a bright and prosperous future
description: maɪ ˈpɛrənts ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ðeɪ wɪʃt fɔr mi tu hæv ə braɪt ænd ˈprɑspərəs ˈfjuʧər.

title: My father chose it because he wished me a life full of joy and good fortune.
segments: a life full of joy and good fortune
highlight: a life full of joy and good fortune
description: maɪ ˈfɑðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz hi wɪʃt mi ə laɪf fʊl ʌv ʤɔɪ ænd ɡʊd ˈfɔrʧən.

title: My grandmother chose it because she believed I would grow up graceful and intelligent.
description: maɪ ˈɡrændˌmʌðər ʧoʊz ɪt bɪˈkɔz ʃi bɪˈlivd aɪ wʊd ɡroʊ ʌp ˈɡreɪsfəl ænd ɪnˈtɛləʤənt.

title: I have ..., and we ... . ... is/are supportive and always ... me ... .
description: aɪ hæv ..., ænd wi ... . ... ɪz/ɑr səˈpɔrtɪv ænd ˈɔlˌweɪz ... mi ... .
